home.title: Uncle Texas Puerto Varas
home.subtitle: Texas-style smoked meats in Southern Chile

slider.body2: We are an authentic smokehouse located in Puerto Varas. Brisket, ribs, pulled pork and Texan-style burgers, slow-cooked and smoked for over 12 hours.
slider.body3: We offer a large backyard, children's games, outdoor tables, heated indoor areas and a cozy atmosphere for everyone.

about.paragraph1: Uncle Texas was born from the mix between Texan BBQ and southern Chile. We are a team of friends and family who fell in love with slow smoking, wood and good conversations around the table.
about.paragraph2: We work with selected meats, cooked low and slow for many hours, accompanied by local beers, music and a relaxed atmosphere designed for groups, families and companies.

menuSection.intro: Our menu may change depending on the season, but these are some classics you'll always find at Uncle Texas.

locationSection.paragraph: We are located just outside Puerto Varas, in our Uncle Texas smokehouse, with a large parking area and a family-friendly atmosphere.
locationSection.addressValue: Uncle Texas, Puerto Varas, Los Lagos Region, Chile.
locationSection.refValue: Located on the road to Puerto Varas, near Route 5, with easy access.
